channel.title: Want to link two dashboards by pasting a link on its widget
channel.description: Hello! Is there a way to link two dashboards? I have dashboard A containing widget and dashboard B containing detailed information of widget on dashboard A. So, the question is - can I somehow link those elements? Now it's working by using text parameter, containing the web link address. So, user needs to tap on textbox, copy the text, open new tab and paste it. Thanks in advance!

item.title: Want to link two dashboards by pasting a link on its widget
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
You can use the HTML link type in table visualisations for this. I wrote up an example of it awhile back here.

Read full topic
item.source: Want to link two dashboards by pasting a link on its widget
